ai.summary: A short, easy 0.4 km hike along the +B40 West Diversion in the UK. Great for a quick outdoor break, families, or a relaxed stroll.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily flat, with well-maintained paths. Surfaces may include paved track, compact dirt, and grassy edges; expect occasional damp sections depending on weather.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on designated paths; be aware of cyclists and pedestrians on shared routes; check weather conditions before you go; wear sturdy footwear; bring a light layer and water; have a charged phone for emergencies.
ai.best_seasons: All year, with particularly pleasant conditions in spring and early autumn; plan for daylight in winter

seo.title: +B40 West Diversion - Easy 0.4 km UK Hike
seo.meta_description: Discover the short and easy 0.4 km hike along the +B40 West Diversion in the UK. Ideal for a quick outdoor escape with practical safety and gear tips.
